block.p: GARFUNKEL-Sally. On June 29, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Julius Garfunkel; cherished mother of Stanley (and Gail) and Sandy (and Pat); grandmother of Jamie, Jed, Eric, Josh and Mickey; sister of Lillian Smith, Claire Novik and Allen Smith; and beloved aunt. Active life member of Hadassah. Graveside funeral at Mt. Moriah Cemetery, Fairview, New Jersey, June 30, 2000, at 1 PM.
